hero.subtitle: AI Architect & Senior Engineer

about.label: About
about.heading: Engineering the future at the
about.paragraph1: With over a decade in software engineering, I've built everything from high-performance frontend applications to full-stack platforms. My work spans from crafting pixel-perfect interfaces with Vue.js, Nuxt, and React to designing complex system architectures.
about.paragraph2Start: Over the past five years, I've pivoted toward AI — designing and deploying autonomous agent systems, building AI-powered workflows, and helping companies integrate intelligent automation into their operations. I founded
about.paragraph2End: to help Czech businesses harness AI agents at scale.

roles.description: Helping Czech companies deploy and manage AI agents. From workflow analysis to fully autonomous agent systems that eliminate repetitive work.
